column4: I'm having problems with getting my screen savers to work, I'm new to unbuntu an learing has a I go
Has anyone used Wine? I'm trying to use some of my windows programs in unbuntu but no luck so far
some programs work very well, like firefox can be installed under wine to fool sites that require xp
some programs you dont even have to install if you have them on a xp partition you can just drag them and they work
